options.name: Spell Thief
options.description: You gain +2 Flexible Spell Slots which you fill with any Beginner or Novice Level Spells from any Traditional School of Magic. When an Ally Channels a Spell with you as the Target, you can replace one of these Spells with the new Spell. You can slot Journeyman Spells at Level 9 and Expert at 11.

options.name: Increased Capacity
options.description: Gain +1 Flexible Spell Slot and +1 Arcanum

options.name: Reaction : Spell Steal
options.description: In response to a Spell being Channeled within 8 Units, you make an Arcanum Check against the Spell Attack. On a success and if you are capable of Learning the Spell, you replace one of your Flexible Spell Slots with this one.

options.name: Craft : Stolen Research
options.description: You can use the Research Recipe to permanently Learn a Spell within your Flexible Spell Slots if it is a Traditional School of Magic.

options.name: Spell Heist
options.description: When a Creature Botches their Spell Attack on your Spell Steal ability, the Spell fails and they cannot use that Spell again for 1 Hour.

options.name: Action : Channel Flexible Spell
options.description: You Channel a Spell from one of your Flexible Spell Slots which is automatically Charged and has a +2 Bonus to its Spell Attack.
